医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
GLP-1 类似物和安非他酮/纳曲酮组合可增强减肥效果一项研究探讨了 GLP-1 类似物与安非他酮/纳曲酮联合使用对减肥的附加效应，发现即使对于那些最初对单一疗法没有反应的人也有潜在的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Enhanced-weight-loss-outcomes-with-GLP-1-analoges-and-bupropionnaltrexone-combination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Enhanced-weight-loss-outcomes-with-GLP-1-analogues-and-bupropionnaltrexone-combination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8aa5030-b8f7-4651-a447-48d3a1a1cd61 Mon, 13 May 2024 00:08:00 -0400 Enhanced weight loss outcomes with GLP-1 analogues and bupropion/naltrexone combination
研究显示儿童死亡率的下降使美国女性的寿命延长了一年使用数学模型的研究表明，20世纪美国儿童死亡率的显着下降间接导致了女性死亡率的下降，使15岁以后女性的平均寿命延长了约一年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240512/Research-reveals-decline-in-childhood-mortality-extended-US-womens-lifespan-by-a-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240512/Research-reveals-decline-in-childhood-mortality-extended-US-womens-lifespan-by-a-year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=330be9a5-13ef-41c0-9448-c53803354424 Sun, 12 May 2024 23:51:00 -0400 Research reveals decline in childhood mortality extended US women's lifespan by a year
新的合作伙伴关系解决了监管数字心理健康技术的关键挑战由 Wellcome 资助的 MHRA 和 NICE 合作伙伴关系正在根据患者、公众和心理健康专业人士的意见，解决监管和评估数字心理健康技术 (DMHT) 的关键挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/New-partnership-addresses-key-challenges-for-regulate-digital-mental-health-technologies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/New-partnership-addresses-key-challenges-for-regulate-digital-mental-health-technologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=931fc7e0-f7c5-4980-92ca-da3764017d3a Sat, 11 May 2024 08:34:00 -0400 New partnership addresses key challenges for regulating digital mental health technologies
美因茨 Biomed 将在 DDW 2024 上公布突破性早期癌症检测研究结果Mainz Biomed NV 是一家专门从事癌症早期检测的分子遗传学诊断公司，将于 5 月 18 日至 21 日在华盛顿特区举办的 2024 年消化疾病周 (DDW) 上展示其 eAArly DETECT 研究的分析结果。 DDW 被公认为胃肠病学、肝病学、内窥镜检查和胃肠外科最新进展的首要论坛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Mainz-Biomed-to-unveil-breakthrough-early-cancer-detection-study-results-at-DDW-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Mainz-Biomed-to-unveil-breakthrough-early-cancer-detection-study-results-at-DDW-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f9c647a-d8e3-41fc-badb-6d101c80e3ec Sat, 11 May 2024 08:28:00 -0400 Mainz Biomed to unveil breakthrough early cancer detection study results at DDW 2024
气候友好型沙丁胺醇吸入器的早期可行性研究已完成DevPro Biopharma 和 Bespak 宣布完成 DP007 的早期可行性研究，DP007 是加压定量吸入器 (pMDI) 中沙丁胺醇的新配方，其性能与 Ventolin® HFA 相当，但温室气体排放量显着减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Early-feasibility-studies-on-climate-friend-albuterol-inhaler-completed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Early-feasibility-studies-on-climate-friend-albuterol-inhaler-completed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f1677d6-05ab-42f5-ba86-662a30edbded Sat, 11 May 2024 08:25:00 -0400 Early feasibility studies on climate-friendly albuterol inhaler completed
斯克里普斯研究中心名誉教授约翰·约翰逊当选美国国家科学院院士斯克里普斯研究中心名誉教授约翰·约翰逊博士已当选为美国国家科学院院士，这是给予科学家的最高荣誉之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Scripps-Research-professor-emeritus-John-Johnson-selected-as-member-of-the-National-Academy-of-Sciences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Scripps-Research-professor-emeritus-John-Johnson-selected-as-member-of-the-National-Academy-of-Sciences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7d2328f-16f3-44c5-b186-0bac53849309 Sat, 11 May 2024 08:21:00 -0400 Scripps Research professor emeritus John Johnson selected as member of the National Academy of Sciences
NHS 仍面临候补名单挑战健康基金会政策助理主任蒂姆·加德纳 (Tim Gardner) 在评论今天发布的 NHS 月度绩效统计数据时表示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/NHS-still-faces-waiting-list-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/NHS-still-faces-waiting-list-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d784233d-7210-49e8-bbcc-8fc6c406273d Sat, 11 May 2024 08:03:00 -0400 NHS still faces waiting list challenges
基因变异会增加美国黑人心力衰竭的风险并缩短寿命布莱根妇女医院和杜克大学的研究人员表明，美国 3-4% 的自认黑人存在基因变异，该变异会增加心力衰竭和死亡的风险，并导致人口寿命显着缩短等级。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Genetic-variant-increases-heart-failure-risk-and-decreases-longevity-in-Black-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Genetic-variant-increases-heart-failure-risk-and-decreases-longevity-in-Black-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48a278a9-4c5e-4802-9223-bb51077074d3 Sat, 11 May 2024 07:43:00 -0400 Genetic variant increases heart failure risk and decreases longevity in Black Americans
扩大超突变尿路上皮癌的治疗范围，超越免疫疗法2024 年 4 月 25 日，《Oncoscience》（第 11 卷）发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“免疫疗法之外的超突变尿路上皮癌的治疗机会”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Expanding-treatment-horizo​​ns-for-hypermutated-urothelial-carcinomas-beyond-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Expanding-treatment-horizo​​ns-for-hypermutated-urothelial-carcinomas-beyond-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65ac6012-5185-4b05-a4ff-e9de6ac5599c Fri, 10 May 2024 23:22:20 -0400 Expanding treatment horizons for hypermutated urothelial carcinomas beyond immunotherapy
了解婴儿视力：日常生活输入与发育营养婴儿看到什么？他们看什么？对于最小的婴儿来说，这些问题的答案与对于较大的婴儿、儿童和成人来说是非常不同的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Understanding-infant-vision-Daily-life-input-and-developmental-nourishment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Understanding-infant-vision-Daily-life-input-and-developmental-nourishment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c143e3d2-0879-44ee-81ba-d0c57ceb48db Fri, 10 May 2024 23:18:18 -0400 Understanding infant vision: Daily-life input and developmental nourishment
